pageContext.geocode_address: 1295 S Reed St, Denver, CO 80232, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Prepare for a full-day LEGO® camp packed with hands-on and minds-on STEM fun! Build projects inspired by cool machines close to home such as Trains, Helicopters, Treehouses, and Beam Bridges. Then build X-Wings, Energy Catapults, and Defense Turrets from a galaxy far, far away! Learn about BOTH kinds of The Force in this new full-day themed engineering camp for LEGO® fanatics!
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM + Jedi w/ LEGO® Materials: FULL DAY
